Introduction: Hi! I am Luny, a little werewolf. Nice to meet you.$h
Resort_Entering: I hope a mermaid visits the beach.
Resort_Leaving: I'm gonna ask Willy if we can take the scenic route back.
Resort_Leaving_2: Maybe we'll see a sea monster on the way back.
Resort_Shore: The beach is okay, but it gets boring pretty quick. I'd rather check out that dark jungle, or the volcano!
Resort_Shore_2: Hmm, you think I could sneak Woo onto the island?#$e#Well, Woo's not much of a swimmer anyways.$h
Resort_Umbrella: My skin gets burnt really easily. So I'm just gonna stay under this umbrella for a while.#$e#I like it in the shade. Too much sun makes me dizzy.
Resort_Umbrella_2: Hey @, want to build a sand castle with me?#$e#Actually, a sand dungeon might be cooler!$h
Resort_Umbrella_3: Hey @, you think you could build a raft?#$e#I saw a few cool islands on the way here I want to visit.
Resort_Wander: An island this big has got to be hiding some buried treasure.#$e#Quick, get me a shovel!#$e#Relax, I'm just kidding.$h
Resort_Bar: Gus made me a dark purple refresher, to match my hair. It tastes great!$h
Resort: Bummer... Willy says we have to stay on the beach...$s#$b#And I brought my sword and everything...$s
danceRejection: That's flattering... but I'm gonna have to say no. Sorry.
divorced: What are you doing here? Just leave me alone!$a
secondChance_Girls: *sigh*... I can't stay mad at you anymore, @. Let's just move on with our lives.$s
breakUp: Oh... I... I understand. You see me as just a friend...$s#$b#I guess we weren't really a good match...$s
Mon: Wow, I really need to shower...#$e#But I won't do that of course$h.
Mon2: Oh, hi!$k#$e#I'm going to stream later, you can come by if you like.$h
Tue: Hey... how are you?.$h#$e#If you're bored, come by my stream.#$e#I'm sure we will have lots of fun.$h
Wed: Hey. I apologise in advance if I drift off a bit. Didn't get much sleep last night.
Thu: #$1 Abigail1#I lost Woo... Where could he have gone??$s#$e#I just want to enjoy the day with my sweet Woo today....$k
Fri: I just realised that it's Friday.$u#$e#Sometimes I completely lose track of time.
Fri2: We will meet in the pub this evening. All Lightmotif Talents will be there.$k#$e#It's somewhat like a collab.$h
spring_8: Spring is really refreshing, isn't it? The flowers are blooming and it smells just wonderful! Woo loves to graze on the fresh spring grass too!
Sun: Oh man... I've been putting off making a stream plan all week. I guess I'll have to make up for it in the night again...$s
Sun2: There are so many great animals...#$q 17/18 Sun_old#@, What is your favorite animal?#$r 17 10 Sun_17#Orcas are cool.#$r 18 40 Sun_18#Wolfs of course!#$r 17 10 Sun_17#Mountain goats are cute.#$r 17 10 Sun_17#Unicorns are great.#$r 17 10 Sun_17#Owls are fantastic.
Sun_old: $p 17#Really every one is great, Right?$k|But we know which animal is the best!$l
Sun_18: I'm glad that wolfes are your favorite!$l
Wed2: Oh, hi @. Are you taking a break?#$e#Me too. Oh! Not from physical work... just from my stream preparation, I still have some things to do.
Tue4: I like to howl at the moon when I'm alone...#$e#Awooooooo!$h
Sat8: Why haven't I transformed even though it's a full moon, you ask? I have transformed!#$e#Tell me, have you always looked so adorable...?$l
Mon8: ...Oh, @! Hi.$h#$e#Want to keep me some company?$h
Thu10: Hi.$l#$e#Don't you think everything doesn't seem real lately?$l#$b#Not in a bad way.$h
Fri6: The birds are chirping happily today.#$e#Would a wizard be able to turn them into a human, like Mona?$9
Event_VideoGame_Yes: Great! I'm sure you'll be able to beat this level with ease.$h
Event_VideoGame_No: Oh? *sigh*... I guess I'll never get past this level, then...$s
Event_Grave1: See? You understand why I'm out here, then.#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Event_Grave2: Sure. I don't want to kill anything, either. I just want to do a little exploring without risking my neck!#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Event_Grave3: Oh, it's because I'm a girl... isn't it? Ugh...$u^Why? I'm just as strong as you!$a#$b#I'm not some fragile princess.. I can take care of myself!$a#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Event_Grave4: Really? That's surprising.$8#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Event_Rain_2: Yea... I guess you would be one to appreciate this somber ambience.
Event_Tragic_1: Yeah... I guess my own life is okay...$s
Event_Tragic_3: I would feel better if I could believe that...#$b#But I don't.$s
Event_Cave_2: I guess when you have something to lose, it's normal to be afraid...$l
summer_1: Summer is here!#$e#The perfect time for an anime beach episode!$h #$e# Or rather a gaming marathon?
summer_Mon: New heat records are being broken today... I bet Woo would love to shed all his wool in this heat.#$e#Maybe we should take him to the beach sometime?
summer_Tue: The Summer is sooo hot, but I am always ready to stream!
summer_Thu4: Streaming in this heat is really uncomfortable.$s#$e#I'm going to do it anyway because I enjoy it so much!$h
summer_Fri: Woo is doing great!$h#$e#Don't be fooled by his looks...$3
summer_Sat: Summer is perfect for streaming gaming! I play games all night with Woo by my side.#$e#What games do you like to play lately?
summer_Sun: Have you ever thought about becoming a streamer, @#$q 25/26 summer_Sun_old#Okay... just imagine yourself as a streamer. What would be your goal?#$r 25 0 Sun_25#To be popular.#$r 26 30 Sun_26#I want to give my fans the best entertainment!#$r 26 20 Sun_26#Collaborate with cool people!#$r 25 -30 Sun_25#Earn a lot of money.
summer_Sun_old: $p 25#I know you're more interested in fame...$3|We have the same goal!$h
Sun_25: Hmm. Not the greatest goal, I think.$3
summer_Tue4: You're an interesting guy, @. I'm glad you moved here.$h^You're an interesting girl, @. I'm glad you moved here.$h
summer_Mon8: I always thought that Pelikan is a little bit bleak but recently I learned to appreciate things more.$h
summer_Thu10: Wow, you look good today.#$e#I mean, the summer air is pretty good for the skin, isn't it.... Hihi...$l
summer_Fri10: Don't you ever feel lonely on your farm?
fall_1: Fall means spooky games and a Spooky VTuber model! Do you have any suggestions on what I should play?
fall_Mon: I need to stretch my legs a bit today and enjoy the fresh air.#$e#Woo comes with me of course!$h
fall_Tue: Woo loves playing in the leaves, I always have to resist joining him!$h
fall_Wed: Woo likes to hide in the leaves and scare me.#$b# Pretty mean of him....
fall_Thu: The leaves are falling and Woo is losing his wool, I think it's time for a grooming session. He is so fluffy.
fall_Sun: Hmm... what should I do today?#$q 27/28 fall_Sun_old#I'm thinking about dyeing my hair again.... What do you think?#$r 27 20 Sun_27#Dye it red.#$r 27 10 Sun_27#Why not blonde?#$r 27 20 Sun_WildColor#How about a stark pink?#$r 28 10 Sun_28#I like your hair the way it is!
fall_Sun_old: $p 27#I was going to dye my hair, but then decided against it.|Yes? What's up?
Sun_27: A bit of an obvious choice, no?#$e#I'll think about it.
Sun_28: Of course you would say something like that.$k
fall_Tue4: Fall nights are perfect for howling at the moon.#$b# Woo even tries to join in sometimes!$h
fall_Sat6: Hi.$h#$e#Your hair looks cool today.... Have you been to the hairdresser?
fall_Mon8: You know, I could imagine living on a farm someday too...#$e#But how would something like that ever happen? #hehe*$l
fall_Thu10: I had an interesting dream last night, and you showed up in it.#$e#It was a good dream.$h
fall_Fri10: I usually feel lonely this time of year, but not anymore.$l#$e#@, what are your plans for the future?
winter_1: Well, fall is over...$s#$e#But I like winter too!$h
winter_Mon: It's just too cold to go out much.#$e#But it's kind of fun to build a snow woo.$h
winter_Tue: Doesn't a steaming hot cup of cocoa sound good right about now?
winter_Wed: Woo's fur gets fluffy in the cold, which makes him look really cute!
spring_12: I will definitely be at the egg hunt tomorrow. You too?
spring_23: Well, tomorrow is the flower dance. The dancing is not a problem, but they make me wear this stupid white dress...$s
winter_7: I'm looking forward to building a snowman tomorrow.
fall_26: Spirit's Eve is coming! Woo and I will put on matching clothes. Werewolf and... Weresheep? Yes that works!
summer_10: Everyone is so excited about the luau tomorrow. I might also be a little nervous because the governor will be there.
summer_12: The luau yesterday was great! I even got Woo to try some coconut milk! #$b#He is more adventurous than you think.
summer_27: You just can't miss tomorrow's festival. It is one of the most beautiful wonders of the valley.
winter_24: I'm going to eat so much cranberry sauce tomorrow.$h
winter_Thu: Another year is almost over.#$e#It goes so fast, doesn't it?$s
winter_Fri: Let's have a snowball fight here! #$b#Or just in Minecraft?$h
winter_Sat: It's the weekend!#$e#That means I can play twice as many video games.$h#$e#Bye.
winter_Sun: Oh, hello.#$q 29/30 winter_Sun_old#I made these two drawings. What do you think of them?#$r 29 20 Sun_29#I like the human mountain goat in the lavapool.#$r 30 5 Sun_30#I like the naked human orca.#$r 29 -50 Sun_Bad#I don't like any of them.
winter_Sun_old: $p 29#Remember the two drawings that i showed you a while ago? I accidentally threw them away.$s|Remember the drawing I showed you with the orca? I entered it in an online contest and won 50G!$h
Sun_30: I'm glad. It is a little emberassing showing your art to others. But you and I are on the same wavelength.
Sun_Bad: How mean! Why are you hurting me like this? You are really insensitive!$s
winter_Wed2: Hi. If you're ever bored, feel free to come to my room.#$e#As long as I'm not changing, of course!
winter_Tue4: It's so cold... I wish I had a hot cup of cocoa to share with someone.
winter_Sat6: I've been having a lot of daydreams lately...#$e#Oh! You want to know what about? Well...$u#$b#... It's a secret.$h
winter_Thu10: Another year is almost over...#$b#But this was a good year, don't you think?$h
winter_Wed6: It must be nice not to have to worry about the plants for a while.#$e#And that means you get to spend time with me more often!$h
winter_Fri10: @, there's something I want to tell you...#$e#It's about.... um... well... your boots! They look, uh... very clean looking... #gulp*#$e#That's all... *sigh*$s
